itunes:title: A Magical Day with an Elephant
itunes:author: Slumber Studios
itunes:subtitle: Narrated by Simon Mattacks. Tembo the elephant takes you on a relaxing tour of Tanzania, from its cities and beaches to the slopes of Mount Kilimanjaro.
